text: Kyzyl Yar () is a rural locality (a village) in Zilim-Karanovsky Selsoviet, Gafuriysky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 49 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 53 km from Krasnousolsky, 4 km from Zilim-Karanovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Gafuriysky District
title: Kyzyl Yar, Gafuriysky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
